content: We' re couple out for tourism.We want to travel for 3 days in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China in winter. Please provide detailed travel routes and daily plans, and provide a specific time(xxam-xxpm), for example "xx am to xx am, to go to XXX; xx pm- xx pm, go to the XXX". Please recommend scenic spots suitable for winter. Add description that shows feature of scenic spots in winter and add description that attract couple in the scenic spots. Meanwhile, Zijin Mountain and West Lake must appear in your recommend and Please report the error when the places we request has nothing to do with the city Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China. The key words are couple, winter, specific time and error report of your recommendation.
